uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.mapping.fixer

Class MappingReferenceResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.mapping.fixer.MappingReferenceResolver

  • public class MappingReferenceResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class to ensure that the atoms referred to in an atom-atom mapping are the same object reference as in the atom containers of the reactants and products.
    Author:
    maclean
